node.display_name: FitXR — Box, Dance and HIIT Fitness
node.display_long_description:
FitXR brings fitness club vibes to your home. 

Fun workouts designed to burn calories, improve strength and get you high on endorphins.

Workout with friends in real-time multiplayer.

With a new workout released every day, we’ve got a class for every goal and fitness level. 

Download now for your 7-day free trial. $9.99/month. Cancel at any time. Terms apply.

Voted Oculus’s best fitness VR game of 2020!

A NEW CLASS EVERY DAY
A new class led by the world’s top instructors is released daily. Choose from Box & Dance workouts, or one from the new HIIT studio.

WORKOUT WITH FRIENDS
Workout in real-time with up to 6 friends in multiplayer and encourage each other over voice chat. Or choose an on-demand group fitness class and take on the leaderboard.

FRESH MUSIC
Powering your workouts are a host of new tracks from some of the best major and indie music labels.

ENERGIZING ENVIRONMENTS
Turn anywhere into a state-of-the-art fitness club with a choice of environments for all moods!

nodes.title: HIIT Studio is Here!
nodes.body_text:
Our new HIIT studio is here! Jump into a HIIT class and test your agility, endurance and reaction speed through guided workouts that will challenge you like no other home workout!

Built from the ground up based on sports science, it takes inspiration from a fitness device used to help train F1 drivers, yet caters to all abilities and fitness levels.

In the same way that a HIIT class involves short bursts of intense activity to get your heart rate pumping, the HIIT studio will push you to your limit through a series of fast-paced cues that you smash as they light up around you.

Think whack-a-mole, but on a totally different level: way more engaging, challenging and fun!

BENEFITS
Apart from feeling amazing from the rush of endorphins that you’ll get post-workout, a HIIT class will help achieve a higher calorie burn, increased metabolic rate and improved oxygen consumption.

Overtime, the health benefits include greater strength, speed and reaction times leading to an overall improved athletic performance.

AVAILABLE AT LAUNCH
HIIT is launching with 3 intro classes available to all regardless of whether or not you're a member.

We will then release new HIIT classes every week as part of our weekly schedule for those who have signed up for membership.

nodes.title: FitXR Membership Information
nodes.body_text:
PREVIOUS FITXR OWNERS
Try membership for free for 90-days. Following your trial, you'll receive a prompt asking if you'd like to renew for $9.99/month.

You won't pay for membership unless you choose to.

If you decide membership isn't for you, you'll keep all the workouts you had before membership, including any DLC packs bought, forever.

And you'll continue to have the new multiplayer feature and environments — plus, you'll still receive future updates, including access to the intro classes of our new HIIT studio.

NEW TO FITXR
Your trial will be for 7 days. If you choose to cancel your membership, you'll keep access to three short intro classes for each studio.

Please contact us at support@fitxr.com if you experience any issues.

node.appName: FitXR — Box, Dance and HIIT Fitness

node.reviewDescription:
Due to unknown errors the number of people who find this review helpful is reset when I update. In truth over 128 people combined have found this and earlier versions helpful.

I hate it when devs convert one-time payment products into subscription services. I'm not going to stand for it.

TO THE DEVELOPERS (UPDATE 5)
Way to double-double-down in the wrong direction. You insult your original, rightfully unhappy, customers claiming they aren't "real" customers, now you're BRIBING people to increase your ratio of FAKE 5 star reviews. Perhaps it's time for trading standards to REALLY get involved.

UPDATE 1
I've contacted the CAB, they advise me that under UK law the developers CANNOT do this. They say:

"UK law states that digital content must match the description and functionality advertised on purchase. These rights come from the Consumer Rights Act 2015."

This should not have replaced BoxVR.

UPDATE 2 
I've reached out to Oculus asking them to remove this product from my account. I just want to end my relationship with this bad faith actor once and for all. Even when an expert has told them they're violating consumer rights and trading standards in their own country, they insist they aren't.  

This developer has abused their position on the Oculus store more than once and will continue to do so. 

UPDATE 3
This developer is now calling anyone posting public reviews not "real" customers. So instead of fixing the problems, they're insulting us. Steer clear of this "game". Don't make the same mistake we did here.

UPDATE 4
Oculus have now told me they cannot remove products from accounts. They also won't refund because I bought when it was BoxVR. However, they did give me partial store credit as compensation.

If enough people ask for the same, maybe Oculus will be forced to improve how they handle this in the future.

Steer clear of the fake 5* reviews. This developer is trying to scam you.
node.reviewTitle: Never buying from this dev again
